DOC.brief_title: 6-year Clinical Evaluation Glass Ionomer Cements ( GIS ) With Resin Coating Posterior Teeth
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate long-term clinical performance two highly viscous encapsulate GICs ( EquiaFil Riva SC ) cover two different coating ( Equia Coat Fuji Varnish ) 6-year use modify United State Public Health Service ( USPHS ) criterion . Fifty-four patient Class I II restorations/caries include study . A total 256 restoration make EquiaFil ( GC Corp , Japan ) Riva SC ( SDI , Australia ) . Equia Coat Fuji Varnish use randomly surface restoration . After cavity preparation , teeth randomly restore one glass ionomer cement coat Equia Coat Fuji Varnish . The restoration evaluate baseline , 6 , 12 , 18 month 6 year placement use modify USPHS criterion . Two evaluator check color-match , marginal discoloration , marginal adaptation , caries formation , anatomical form , postoperative sensitivity retention rate photograph take recall . The result evaluate Pearson Chi-Square Mann Whitney U-test ( p < 0.05 ) . The 18-month result present CED IADR congress iheld Barcelona 2010 ( Turkun LS , & Kanic O , Clinical evaluation new glass ionomer coating combine system 18-months Journal Dental Research 89 ( Special Issue B ) Abstract # 402 . ) Gurgan S et al . also mention 18-month result publish manuscript ( Gurgan S , Kutuk ZB , Ergin E , Oztas ZZ & Cakir FY ( 2015 ) Four-year randomize clinical trial evaluate clinical performance glass ionomer restorative system Operative Dentistry 40 ( 2 ) 134-143 ) .
DOC.criteria: 1. good oral hygiene ; 2. need least two posterior restoration contact neighbour tooth occlusion antagonist teeth ; 3. teeth plan restore vital symptomless ; 4. cavity isthmus size 1/3 intercuspal distance . 1. absence adjacent antagonist teeth ; 2. teeth periodontal problem ; 3. teeth preoperative pain pulpal inflammation ; 4. teeth formerly subject direct pulp capping ; 5. patient severe systemic disease , allergy adverse medical history .
